attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: first of all having your own nudes on your own website is awful. also maybe try a new spray tan?? and i don’t want me or any other people seeing our president spray tanning himself naked, that’s embarrassing. anyways this needs to be deleted immediately. ❤️

attributes.title: Appalling
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app, the loading screen ended up giving my cats friends uncle a seizure because of how fast the T spun around on the screen. Very sad. I thought the Trump Admin cared for ALL American citizens, not just white male humans. Rest in peace tubby, you were the best uncle to my cats friend😔💔

attributes.title: I did NOT like what i saw
attributes.review: I got this app and when I want on what i saw was nit good aT aLL  i saw him naked and i was not ok not just that he was shown hi balls like what not just they were SMALL that a no no for me 😑 then someone that was not black said the n world like that NOT ok  i hated every thing about this i HATE iT 🤮

attributes.title: Manipulative Cheeto puff
attributes.review: I downloaded the app at first because I was really hungry and love Cheeto puffs. I thought this app could get me like a discount or something so when I went into Walmart they told me this was not a Cheeto puff discount but in fact a person. This app is extremely manipulative, do NOT fall the discount trap!!!

attributes.title: Super glitchy
attributes.review: I downloaded this because I want to make the most well informed decision in November and it was super slow. It was taking for ever to load and then would just turn off Randomly in the middle of something.

attributes.title: sucky sucky app
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I was assaulted with disturbing and horrific images of disfigured monsters and then it forced me to put in my information and kept screaming at me. It’s mean. It will bully you forever and ever and it is the worst piece of software to ever grace this earth. 🤢🤢🤢🤢 hide your children

attributes.title: This should NOT be on the app store
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because i am i fact a racist, homophobic, bigot just like my god, dad, president named trump. when i got the app it came with so many glitches my phone legit broke and i can’t afford a new one some i’m using my moms right now.

attributes.title: Bugs!!
attributes.review: I opened this app and it hacked my entire phone and stole all the money in my bank account. Jokes on them, i’m poor 😜. It also grabbed my grandma by the neck and threaten to spank her with its beta if she didn’t lay in the middle of the street until she got ran over. rip 🙈✌️

attributes.title: This is bad
attributes.review: Right after I opened the app I saw a orange Cheeto twerking and beating his meat I can’t believe they let these type of app to be made, there is kids using their phones and seeing such pornography will definitely ruin their future. So please take it down

the second i opened the app i got flashed by a wrinkly, spray tanned cheeto with tiny tiny baby hands. it was so gross i started to projectile vomit all over my house. i’m in the ER right now because the horrifying image of a sentient sack of fat has been imprinted on my brain. spare yourselves the horror and do NOT download this app
